original_title: Mister Rogers: It's You I Like
overview: Join host Michael Keaton to celebrate "Mister Rogersâ€™ Neighborhood," the pioneering children's series that premiered nationally 50 years ago. Celebrities, cast members and Joanne Rogers reveal their favorite memories from the series.

title: Mister Rogers: It's You I Like
